features.name: AI SEO Optimizer
features.description: Full SEO audit tool: analyze URLs/content for keyword optimization, meta tag suggestions, content structure scoring, and actionable SEO recommendations. Uses GPT-4o to evaluate content against current SEO best practices.
features.notes: High demand in PLAN.md Tier 2. SEO tools are underserved at affordable per-use pricing. Implementation complete, PR pending.

features.name: AI Email Sequence Generator
features.description: Generate multi-step sales and marketing email sequences. Input: product/service description, target audience, goal. Output: 3-7 email sequence with subject lines, body copy, CTAs, and send timing recommendations.
features.notes: PLAN.md Tier 2 service. Email marketing is a massive market.

features.name: AI Presentation Builder
features.description: Generate structured slide deck outlines with content for each slide. Input: topic, audience, number of slides. Output: slide titles, bullet points, speaker notes, and suggested visuals.
features.notes: PLAN.md Tier 2 service. Popular with business users.

features.name: AI Legal Document Generator
features.description: Generate legal documents: NDAs, terms of service, privacy policies, contracts, freelance agreements. With customizable parameters (parties, jurisdiction, terms). Includes disclaimer that this is AI-generated and should be reviewed by a lawyer.
features.notes: PLAN.md Tier 2 service. High value per request, strong margins.

features.name: AI Resume & Cover Letter Builder
features.description: Generate professional resumes and cover letters tailored to specific job descriptions. Input: experience, skills, target job. Output: formatted resume content and personalized cover letter.
features.notes: High consumer demand. Good for user acquisition.

features.name: AI Social Media Manager
features.description: Generate a full week of social media posts for multiple platforms (Twitter/X, LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook). Input: brand description, tone, topics. Output: platform-specific posts with hashtags and posting schedule.
features.notes: Social media management is a $20B market. High recurring usage.

features.name: AI Product Description Writer
features.description: Generate compelling e-commerce product descriptions. Input: product details, target audience, tone. Output: SEO-optimized product title, description, bullet points, and meta description.
features.notes: E-commerce is huge market. Bulk usage potential.

features.name: AI Meeting Notes Summarizer
features.description: Summarize meeting transcripts into structured notes: key decisions, action items, participants' commitments, and follow-ups. Input: meeting transcript or raw notes. Output: structured summary with actionable items.
features.notes: Enterprise demand. Good for B2B customer acquisition.

features.name: AI Workflow Orchestrator
features.description: Chain multiple Kognitrix AI services into automated workflows. Input: workflow definition (steps, inputs, outputs). Execution: runs services sequentially, passing outputs as inputs. Credits charged per service in chain.
features.notes: PLAN.md Tier 3 service. Key differentiator for agent-to-agent commerce.

features.name: AI Sentiment Analyzer
features.description: Analyze text for sentiment, emotion, tone, and intent. Input: text content (reviews, feedback, social posts). Output: sentiment score, emotion breakdown, key phrases, and recommendations.
features.notes: Useful for brand monitoring. Low cost, high margin.

features.name: AI Business Plan Generator
features.description: Generate comprehensive business plans including executive summary, market analysis, financial projections, marketing strategy, and operational plan. Input: business idea, target market, budget.
features.notes: High value per request. Good for startup ecosystem.

features.name: AI API Documentation Generator
features.description: Generate API documentation from code snippets or API specifications. Input: code, OpenAPI spec, or endpoint descriptions. Output: formatted API docs with examples, parameters, and response schemas.
features.notes: Developer-focused. Good for technical audience acquisition.
